name: Neon Sins -NS#04- Rise
description: (FULLSCREEN/SOUND ON) NS#04: "On my way home, the public transport stops at Mora Station. Located in the oldtown district of the city, let's just say that the station has seen better days. However the view from the transport as you see it rise, the way nearby buildings reveal the grandeur of the city, almost like a curtain dropping on a bedazzling jewel...that is something to witness in person. " |||---||| "Neon Sins is a window into the urban sprawling concrete jungle of the neo-future. Come on a journey and witness the city as it comes alive. A hard place for those trying to make an honest living but a haven for those who can't wait to paint the night with their neon sins." |||---||| The whole short can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/2gPfIVbfq2U |||---||| 1920x1080 MP4 AUDIO/VIDEO LOOP
